projects.title: Juniper's Christmas
projects.description: Cover art and illustrations for Juniper's Christmas, written by best-selling author of Eoin Colfer, and published by HarperCollins.

projects.title: The Culture Of Clothes
projects.description: A beautiful picture book exploring different cultures through traditional clothing and fashion. Detailed illustrations showcase the diversity and beauty of cultural dress from around the world.

projects.title: Anni Dreams of Biryani
projects.description: A delightful children's book about food, family, and dreams. Published by Amazon Two Lions, this story celebrates South Asian culture through beautiful illustrations and a heartwarming narrative.

projects.title: Reader's Digest - The Hole in The Fence
projects.description: An engaging story published in Reader's Digest featuring intricate illustrations that bring the narrative to life. A tale of curiosity, discovery, and childhood wonder.

projects.title: Big Cats
projects.description: Educational illustrations for 'A Day In The Life' series, showcasing the majestic world of big cats through detailed and scientifically accurate artwork.

projects.title: Hide-and-Seek History: The Greeks
projects.description: An interactive educational book that combines history with engaging illustrations. Part of the Hide-and-Seek History series, bringing ancient Greek civilization to life for young readers.
